owner.name: Transit by Time
owner.description: Transition from one value to another according to a certain interpolator within a certain time range. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, and Color.

owner.name: Start
owner.description: Execute the next node when an effect starts.

property.value: Execute the next node when an effect starts.

owner.name: Select
owner.description: Select an item to output according to the input index. You can click "+" to add more items. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, String, Color, Texture 2D, Rect, and Material.

property.value: Select an item to output according to the input index. You can click "+" to add more items. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, String, Color, Texture 2D, Rect, and Material.
Transition from one value to another according to a certain interpolator within a certain time range. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, and Color.

nodeList.name: Screen Tap
nodeList.description: Execute the next node when the device screen is tapped. It is executed as soon as the finger touches the device screen.

property.value: Execute the next node when the device screen is tapped. It is executed as soon as the finger touches the device screen.

owner.name: Multiply
owner.description: Multiply two values. You can click "+" to add more inputs. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3, and Vec4.

owner.name: Add
owner.description: Calculate the sum of two inputs. You can click "+" to add more inputs. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3, and Vec4.

owner.name: Vertex to Rect
owner.description: Create a rectangle by specifying its 4 corners positions.

owner.name: Add
owner.description: Calculate the sum of two inputs. You can click "+" to add more inputs. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3, and Vec4.

owner.name: Multiply
owner.description: Multiply two values. You can click "+" to add more inputs. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3, and Vec4.

property.value: Multiply two values. You can click "+" to add more inputs. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3, and Vec4.

nodeList.name: Combine
nodeList.description: Pack inputs into a vector or color data. The number of inputs depends on the selected data type. And the outputs are in the same order as they were inputted. Supported types: Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, and Color.

owner.name: Split
owner.description: Unpack a vector or color data into separate output values. The number of outputs depends on the selected data type. Supported types: Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, and Color.

property.value: Unpack a vector or color data into separate output values. The number of outputs depends on the selected data type. Supported types: Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, and Color.

Pack inputs into a vector or color data. The number of inputs depends on the selected data type. And the outputs are in the same order as they were inputted. Supported types: Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, and Color.

nodeList.name: Random
nodeList.description: Generate a random number within a certain range.

owner.name: Floor
owner.description: Round down the input value. It is first integer smaller or equal to the input.

owner.name: Peek
owner.description: Monitor and display the value of the input in real time, or output the value to another node. Supported types: Number, Bool, Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, Color, String, and Rect.

owner.name: Start
owner.description: Execute the next node when an effect starts.
